# Create a Seed Mnemonic

## About Mnemonics

Mnemonics are a popular method for generating cryptographic seeds in a more user-friendly way. A mnemonic phrase, seed
phrase, or recovery phrase is a sequence of words that users can easily write down and verify. These words are carefully
selected from a predefined wordlist to ensure compatibility across different wallets and systems.

The IOTA SDK uses the [BIP39](https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/BIP_0039), [BIP44](https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/BIP_0044) and [SLIP10](https://github.com/satoshilabs/slips/blob/master/slip-0010.md) standards to generate addresses and sign transactions.
This means that the SDK can deterministically derive the seed from a mnemonic or seed phrase, making it easier for your
users to write down or remember.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>

<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

You can use the the
[`Client::generate_mnemonic()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/client/core/struct.Client.html#method.generate_mnemonic)
function to generate a random mnemonic.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create_mnemonic.rs#L14
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

You can use the [`Utils.generateMnemonic()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#generatemnemonic) function
to generate a random mnemonic.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create-mnemonic.ts#L12
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

You can use the [`Utils.generate_mnemonic()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#generate_mnemonic) function
to generate a random mnemonic.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create_mnemonic.py#L4
```

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Mnemonic: defy forest author famous found replace salad apple trial alien agent crush little east slim seminar icon wall tumble online knee test beyond gloom
```
